name: Flick Champions XS
description:
Welcome to the latest, and the most Extreme Compilation in Flick Champions™ Series, featuring:

SIX AWESOME EXTREME SPORTS: Quad Bikes, Windsuit, Parkour, Rock Climbing, Paintball and Surfing!
THREE GAME MODES: Endless, Career and Multiplayer Challenges!
TONS OF POWER-UPS: Paint Grenades, Force Fields, Jetpacks, Wave Boosters and more!
GLOBAL CHALLENGES: Against friends or daredevils!
STUNNING GRAPHICS: iPhone X fullscreen mode!

Visit Extreme Islands and jump into Career Mode to win cups in every sport, conquering every discipline, challenge by challenge, on a tropical archipelago. Jump into Quick Game mode and master your favourite discipline or face skilled human opponents in Challenges mode. Extreme fun, yes.
